Way of the Hero ebook

Learn the twelve secrets to facing adversity
& managing your emotions.

We take the best of therapeutic wisdom, ancient philosophy and coaching theory and package them into innovative self-development journeys.

Each bespoke Awake journey includes masterclass videos, guided meditations, workbook assignments and live webinars hosted by qualified experts.

Tell me more

Awake journey - the steps

We have created a unique four-part learning process. This journey of contemplation and discovery takes you from knowing to being, making the wisdom central of your everyday reality.

Masterclass video

Begin your journey by learning the source code, the underlying wisdom based on well-established therapies & philosophies. Our masterclass videos are delivered by expert therapists and coaches.

Awake workbook

Our tailored Awake journal allows you to reflect on the teaching and begin ‘doing the work’. Each video class will have homework for you to work through in your own time.

Therapeutic Meditation

Fusing therapeutic wisdom with meditation, our guided audio & breathwork journeys are an innovation in this space. The meditations amplify your ability to understand, reflect and integrate new learning.

Streaming Webinars

Each week we deliver live streaming classes, so that you can message an expert and get your questions answered. This helps to further integrate and clarify knowledge as you progress.

Find out which journey is right for you?
